data.text2: Given the information that the PM-10 measurement was 300 micrograms per cubic meter over a 24-hour sampling period, determine if each statement is True or False.
data.text3: Seasonal changes could affect the PM-10 concentrations causing a high variance in this result.
data.text5: One measurement is not representative of the actual concentration throughout the deployment.
data.text7: Based on this PM-10 measurement, military personnel would definitely be affected.
data.text9: This PM-10 measurement is above the 1-year air MEG.
